pr_title: Removes zipkin dependency from Brave core

timeline.message:
Removes zipkin dependency from Brave core

This implements json directly in MutableSpan in order to decouple Brave
from Zipkin types. Future work can decouple ancillary modules such as
tests or make a high-performance code for zipkin-reporter-java (or even
a non zipkin-reporter-java variant).

timeline.bodyText: Forget if we have a ThreadLocal StringBuilder buffer, it would probably help here. But can do it later if we don't have it conveniently available.
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: if we bound it I suppose we could? This is currently only used in logging and I'm not sure if we want to leave a stringbuilder on each thread just in case toString is called...
